text: Arthur Saunders Rich (28 June 1807 – 4 September 1865) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1833 to 1838. A left-handed batsman, he made six known appearances in first-class matches.CricketArchive. Retrieved on 4 December 2008. He represented the South in the North v. South series. ==References== Category:1807 births Category:1865 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:English cricketers of 1826 to 1863 Category:North v South cricketers Category:Left-Handed v Right-Handed cricketers Category:Non-international England cricketers
title: Arthur Rich
